answers.answer: I'm still sort of in the beginning of third trimester. I'm 29w and sometimes I experience the same thing.
That's a sign of preeclampsia I would call your dr. I'm dealing with it myself and it's caused many nights in the hospital.
^^^ yes what she said. Preclampsia is not something to mess with

I've been experiencinq it too ... I've also qotten dizzy to the fact I feel Im qonna fall .. i told my Dr.and had to take some blood tests I see the results tomorrow .. i hope its not preclamsia or nothin serious

@Cxci I saw your other post about swelling you sound like that's probably what it is you might get induced early if that's what it is and if it's bad. With my first I was induced at 37 weeks and this one they're gonna see how I do. I'm seeing a specialist and my dr twice a week and doing test all the time to make sure my protein levels And blood pressure aren't rising. I'll be 35 weeks tomorrow.

question: I don't know if anyone is experiencing this and I'm kind of hopeing someone is,I've been having blurred vision and is really starting to scare me, I think it's the fact that it's time I get my eyes checked and get glasses or if it's the fact it's the 3rd trimester ? Help!?
title: 3rd trimester blurred vision
